statements: SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, value FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, timestamp FROM sensors WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%humidity%' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, location_id FROM sensors ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(reading_value) AS max_value, MIN(reading_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, reading_value FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type='temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, log_message FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01' AND log_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT sensor_name, reading, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, log_message, log_time FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_time;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, location, measurement_type, measurement_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_name, log_date, log_message FROM sensor_logs INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensor_logs.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE measurement_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE measurement_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, measurement_type, measurement_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%humidity%' ORDER BY measurement_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_logs WHERE log_date >= '2021-10-01' AND log_date < '2021-11-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_metadata.sensor_id, sensor_metadata.manufacturer, sensor_data.sensor_name FROM sensor_metadata INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensor_metadata.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Lab' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT Sensors.sensor_id, sensor_name, reading_time, value FROM SensorRecords JOIN Sensors ON SensorRecords.sensor_id = Sensors.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Kitchen'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM Sensors JOIN SensorTypesMapping ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorTypesMapping.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM SensorTypesMapping WHERE type_id = 1)
